# Brazier of Aura Revealing (Good) (WondArch)
## Overview
**Brazier of Aura Revealing (Good):** This works like a *[[Brazier of Aura Revealing (Evil) (WondArch)|brazier of aura revealing (evil)]]*, except that it detects good instead and you can only be overwhelmed if youâ€™re evil.

*Caster Level:* 3rd; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Detect Good (Spell)|detect good]]**; Market Price:* 3,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 72
